answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
James – Below are links to 4 City Manager contracts that I hope you find useful!
City of Eastpointe, MI
http://www.cityofeastpointe.net/managercontract.pdf 
City of San Leandro, CA
http://www.sanleandrobytes.com/archives/008710.html
City of Lewiston, ME
http://www.ci.lewiston.me.us/humanresources/files/labor-contracts/CityAdministrator2010-2012.pdf
City of Spokane Valley, WA
http://www.mrsc.org/contracts/S72CMAgreement.pdf 
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org

answers.author: William Emerson
answers.text:
This one's based on the ICMA, but has a 3-month cool down period and a provision that Council violation of its Code of Ethics (uncured within 60 days) is a constructive termination.


This one's based on the ICMA, but has a 3-month cool down period and a provision that Council violation of its Code of Ethics (uncured within 60 days) is a constructive termination.
